exact_source: Auric Mining Limited (ASX: AWJ) (Auric or the Company) is pleased to announce that through its wholly owned entity Widgie Gold Pty Ltd (WGPL) it has entered into an agreement to purchase 8 tenements from Loded Dog Prospecting Pty Ltd (Loded Dog), covering 113 square kilometres in the Widgiemooltha-Higginsville district, subject to one condition precedent.
